text: Blonde or Brunette is a 1927 American romantic comedy movie directed by Richard Rosson and starring Adolphe Menjou, Greta Nissen, Arlette Marchal, Mary Carr, Emile Chautard, Paul Weigel, Henry Sedley . It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Blonde or Brunette @ IMDb.com *synopsis AllMovie.com Category:1927 comedy movies Category:1927 romance movies Category:1920s romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Rosson
title: Blonde or Brunette
